title: Regarding Skin Shards in 8.5
body: So since 8.5, we are able to auto unlock ultimate/mystic skin shards w/o orange essence, does this mean that the ultimate skin shards that we currently have won't change to become unlockable w/o paying orange essence, or do we still have to pay for it?

replies.body: As far as I know it doesn't apply retroactively, so shards you had before the change will still need to be upgraded.
